posts.postText: Hello NNJG peoples. I'm ElectricCheese, I'm here because the jailbreak server is fun and stuff. I'm gonna stick around on the forums, make some posts, etc. Keep up the good work with the server!

Listen junior,
It's a dangerous world out there. Full of crazies and batshits.
I want to  Personally  welcome you to the forums, and encourage you to read the rules  before postin''.
Don't ever let  ANYONE  tell you differently.  EVER. 
These people have lost their minds, they can't form a proper sentence anymore, let alone welcome someone to a forum of a community.
So again, welcome.
 And brace yourself for the replies to this post which will be here any second now.

Welcome to the server, and soon, welcome to my bed~
I hope you enjoy your stay.
